title: NNVCD Fatality Audit Configuration
description: Configuration for auditing reported fatality counts against historical averages

audit_logic.comparison_base: Historical ACLED data for similar events in same LGA/State

minor_discrepancy.range: Reported fatalities within Â±50% of historical average

major_discrepancy.range: Reported fatalities >150% or <50% of historical average
major_discrepancy.example: Report of 10 deaths when historical average for similar event is 2

no_historical_data.action: Flag for human review if reported fatalities >5

processing_steps.step_1: Extract reported fatality count from incoming report
processing_steps.step_2: Retrieve historical fatality averages for similar event types in location
processing_steps.step_3: Compare reported count against historical average using defined thresholds
processing_steps.step_4: Assign verification_status based on discrepancy level
processing_steps.step_5: Log audit result with confidence level for review if flagged

confidence_levels.medium: Single reliable source or consistent local reporting
